ingredients.content: 4 bananas (approx. 300 g), peeled, cut into pieces (3 cm) and frozen
400 g milk of choice (e.g. nut milk, rice milk, soy milk)

preparations.content: Place oats and linseeds (flaxseeds) into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add all remaining ingredients and blend <b>1 min/speed 9<b>. Serve immediately.
